ComicInfo.Summary: Sara, Jake and Magdalena take a murder investigation to a party as they infiltrate a social gathering of the Solites, an offshoot Kabbalah group. When Mandy invites Jake outside to talk, Sara thinks she has her killer cornered until the streets around them go wild.
ComicInfo.Tags: Victor Tabisch,Julie Pezzini,Jake McCarthy,Joe Siry,New York City,New York State,Sara Pezzini,Magdalena,Kilby,Level 42,Witchblade
